Articles.Content:
agian i push the magical reset button and reset the hill and the earth along with it. and then procede to plant a small tree on the hill for flags to be hung on then claim the hill.

now its my hill
As you have no defenses, I shoot you and claim the hill as my own.

As you only have a gun, I hire a professional ninja to take the hill for me. He then betrays me and takes the hill for himself.

The untrustworthy ninja's hill.

As the ninja never killed me, I snipe him from the hill and set up turrets surrounding the hill.

My hill.

You forgot that they were crap turrets. \*click\*click\*click\*click\*

I calmly walk over and kill you.

My hill.
I slap a packet up your back and press a button. You blow up. My hill.

I send in my massive airship fleet of 300 with almost a thousand para-troops ,and air fighters in each one.Now do the math ,and your are slain.

this hill is now under control of the Emprian Republic.

Two words: "Creeper Apocalypse"

My hill.

One word: "Ninja".

My hill.

ultimate word: exterminatus

(the hill is now reset by the way and i planted the tree once more)

my hill

**Edited <time datetime="2014-01-07T14:17:28Z" title="01/07/2014 02:17  PM" data-short="10 yr">January 7, 2014</time> by toolofdarkness**

I am the king of this hill!

Obey!

\*orders a shrubbery to be planted on the hill to go with the remaining trees and clumps of grass.\*

I bring Karl Marx back to life with my fancy magic and create a mini russian revolution and overthrow you.

My communist hill

I throw pie in your face!! 

Ps it had a land mine in it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Pss TLK is back!!!

My hill!

I give Jeb infinite funding, and tell him to use your hill as a launch site

My hill

I go to laythe and claim a hill 

My hill

use a virus bom on laythe making it inposibel to live on so there for the hill skyler owns atthe moment is the only hill in relivence then proceed to kill skyler

my hill

Ze virus keels you.

Meh Hyll.

i burn the hill and the earth along with it due to the fact that virus bombs eat all biomass on a planet and turns it in to a flamiable gas. then reset the hill and plant a tree.

my hill once more you can guess how it happened

Build the death star, blow up your planet, find a planetary system with a habitable body and put it outside normal space time, find the tallest point and claim it.

By hill.

first i reset the hill which resets the planet then i proceed to rip your planet apart with the powers of the warp

since the reseting hill is the only hill in relevence agian i clam it as mine and plant a tree on it

my hill

yes, but due to it being outside normal space time, you can't reset it. (also I removed the reset button)

My Hill

I saw through your bones

My hill
I notice your saw is dull from sawing through bones. I shoot you in the head and claim the hill. MY hill.

Let's see... I have a tank in my signature... why not use that? I shoot you in the head with a 120mm HE round. No part of you survives.

My hill and tank!

Hang on a minute - the (my) hill is outside normal space-time, therefor you couldn't exactly saw through my bones as you can't get to me to do it. Therefore all posts after that are invalid.

my hill
